articles.description: Official ICC Cricket website - live matches, scores, news, highlights, commentary, rankings, videos and fixtures from the International Cricket Council.
articles.content:
• Scotland overcome Italy in final U19 fixture to conclude their table-topping campaign and qualify for the ICC U19 Mens Cricket World Cup 2024
